1273020.name: Dark Side
1273020.description:
Below is the description of the game

psychological suspense / horror game in the first person, you wake up in a strange and unknown place, apparently wearing special clothes, and you need to find out where you are as soon as possible, because your oxygen level is low!

You wake up in a seemingly unknown and dark place, realize that you are wearing a suit and an oxygen mask to be able to breathe and the oxygen levels are decreasing. You will need to explore this location and activate all the light points before the oxygen levels reach their end!

Is there anything in this place besides darkness?

Whenever possible, avoid running, but if necessary, run for your life!
1273020.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
